snippet: Andy Puzder will be “a champion for working Americans, which is exactly the mandate voters delivered at the polls in November.”...
abstract: Letter from former House Speaker Newt Gingrich responds to Dec 9 editorial criticizing Andrew Puzder, Pres-elect Donald Trump's choice for Labor Sec.
lead_paragraph: Andy Puzder will be “a champion for working Americans, which is exactly the mandate voters delivered at the polls in November.”

headline.print_headline: Newt Gingrich’s Praise for Labor Secretary Nominee
headline.main: Newt Gingrich’s Praise for the Labor Secretary Nominee
